snippet: As Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo and Rob Astorino intensify their attacks on each other, football and mythology are taking on prominence.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo and Republican opponent Rob Astorino intensify attack ads against each other as race for governor heats up; efforts are, so far, focusing on increasingly colorful back-and-forth rather than issues with real substance.
lead_paragraph: As Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo and Rob Astorino intensify their attacks on each other, football and mythology are taking on prominence.

headline.main: Ad Duel in Governor’s Race Turns Toward the Trivial
headline.print_headline: Ad Duel in Governor’s Race Turns Toward the Trivial
